message: We have a right to see the shooter's face. And if he had any help with the killings, we deserve to see their stupid faces, too. But don't you worry - we will engrave the names of the fallen in letters of fire upon Dallas' collective heart.

Funny.... Donald J. Trump is a Republican, and he doesn't seem to be having trouble with the media. Has anyone noticed that Ted Cruz is ALWAYS looking for someone to blame for his own failures? He blames the GOP leaders in the Senate and House. He blames President Obama. He blames the Supreme Court. Now he blames the media. Is it possible that maybe -- just maybe -- Senator Ted Cruz over-promised his voters something he KNEW he could not deliver...just so he could get elected?
